definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: In addition, the inscription on precipices in Ming dynasty also add somewhat majesty to the ancient shut fortress.
sentences.chinese: 明代摩崖石刻也给古关要塞增添了几分威严。

sentences.english: Is yet tower in the tiger door now.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经是虎门要塞了。

sentences.english: The other two federal forts, however, became pawns in a game of war or peace.
sentences.chinese: 而其它两座要塞则成为战争或和平游戏当中的马前卒。

sentences.english: Do not Cypriots in the mouthful of food, a one eat slowly.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要塞得满嘴的食物，慢慢一口一口吃。

sentences.english: Each of our instanced dungeons is tailor made for one level range.
sentences.chinese: 我们的每个要塞场景都是按照各等级量身定做的。

sentences.english: Zoram'gar Outpost will be a Warsong Hold style base.
sentences.chinese: 佐拉姆加前哨站将会变为一座战歌堡风格的要塞。

sentences.english: Lorekeep, the great city of necromantic magic, lies in ruins .
sentences.chinese: 学识要塞，伟大的巫术魔法之城，现在已是一片废墟。

sentences.english: They retook a fortress in the naval port.
sentences.chinese: 他们夺回军港中的一个要塞。

sentences.english: No doors there are to this stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 这要塞没设任何出入的门禁。

sentences.english: Players will be able to control stationnary cannons on each tower to defend the keep.
sentences.chinese: 玩家们可以控制板楼上的炮台，协助戍守要塞。

sentences.english: He led an assault on the enemy's fortress.
sentences.chinese: 他领导了对敌人要塞的进击。

sentences.english: When the fortress went on red alert, they sealed off the sewers.
sentences.chinese: 当要塞进入红色警戒状态，他们就会封锁下水道。

sentences.english: Our troops finally retook the stronghold but suffered great loss.
sentences.chinese: 我军终于夺回了要塞，但损失严重。

sentences.english: Soon they seemed almost like members of the garrison.
sentences.chinese: 很快，他们看起来就像是要塞的一员了。

sentences.english: Hwaseong is the fortification of the city Suwon south of Seoul in South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 华城是韩国首都首尔南部水源市的要塞。

sentences.english: People will never forget the struggle at the bordering fortress of Brest.
sentences.chinese: 人们永远不会忘记在边境布列斯特要塞的战斗。

definition: an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
